text: Videodrome is a 1983 Canadian American science fiction horror movie directed by David Cronenberg and starring James Woods, Debbie Harry, Sonja Smits, Leslie Carlson, Jack Creley. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and is a cult classic. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 science fiction movies Category:1983 horror movies Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies directed by David Cronenberg Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Cult movies
title: Videodrome
